reviews.reviewText: Fantastic company, came out and fixed the washer drain and capped a gas line, super quick. Very friendly, prompt, and affordable!
Service is great! Very courteous and reliable. Highly recommend his services!
Great old country boys that do their work fast and professional.
Very professional, quick to get us on their schedule and reasonably priced. Would HIGHLY recommend

Wow, they came in sooner than what I thought. They were quick and fixed my issue. These guys really know what they are doing. Their office lead who took my call was so great to talk to. Thank you all for the help! I will definitely call again as I have a lot of work to do!

All around Honesty, Integrity and Professionalism seem to be trademark with this company.

I called Hammock plumbing about a main line water leak around 8:20 am. I had to leave a message. Around 8:50 am, Donna called me back. She very courteously explained why she didn't answer initially. We then discussed my issue. She forwarded my information to Joe & Jake Hammock. They were already working in my area and by 9:20 they were at my home. They asked me a few questions and started working. Most importantly, thy explained what they were doing while doing it. ??  A Family company that treats you like family.
The job was totally finished by 10:05 am??.
I have to say that they are true professionals. If more stars were possible, I'd rate them higher. Not only will I use them in the future,
I will certainly recommend Hammock Plumbing Co to my network.

Roll Tide ?
Senordor Hines
The best plumbers? great people!!!!!!

They were just phenomenal. My water heater burst without warning, and I was genuinely distraught at the thought of the cost. I called them after seeing these reviews. They were kind and quick, diagnosed the problem right away, and were very very affordable. I could cry with relief. Thank you thank you thank you!

I tried two other companies before finding out about Hammock Plumbing. Boy have I wished I called them first. They are some of the most courteous, professional, and reliable people you will ever meet. They definitely go above and beyond!! They are going to make certain you're straight. I told them they are family now :) Thank you for all you do!!

These guys showed up when they said they would. They replaced about 60 feet of water line (which included digging up the old line, and covering up the new line) from our meter to our house, put our pressure reducing valve in the correct place, and installed a cutoff valve in 1 hr and 15 minutes. And, $2000.00 less than the Company that we were originally gonna have do it.
Give these guys a call if you some plumbing done. Ms. Donna was awesome too. She kept us informed about the process.
Thanks guys.

I called and spoke with Ms Donna about a water leak. She was so friendly and said she would call me back when they were available. Within 15 minutes she called and said they were on the way and I  think from my call and completion of the job was about an hour.  Found two leaks and within minutes they were repaired. Thanks for the prompt service and caring courteous people. Will call again for sure.

This is the second time I called them for help. The day before New Years Eve, 2021, they came &  fixed an outside frozen busted water pipe. The job was completed in a quick professional manner. I expected to be  charged a high holiday price but no. I was amazed at the normal rate. Unfortunately, i forgot to post a review for that job.

Therefore, today I am using this opportunity to give them a well deserved 5* rating for both jobs. Yesterday late in the evening, I ran over an outside water faucet with my truck. Of course, I called my favorite plumbers today & they arrived about 2hrs later.
These guys are friendly experienced professionals. They completed the job quickly & at a very reasonable price.
Thank you!
I called at 1:00PM and they were at my house in 20 minutes.  Found the leak in the main waterline and repaired in less than an hour.  Highly Recommend!
I called the office at 1:00 pm and they were at my house by 3:00 pm. They replaced my sink drains and replaced all the pipes under my sink. Very nice and knowledgeable.  5 stars +
Wonderful service and nice people! The only plumbers that I will use- Always very quick service, always will recommend Hammock Plumbing!

reviews.reviewText: Mark went out of his way to install hot water heater in a difficult area. Professional, poliet, kind & caring. Covered & protected carpet. Then added aerator to kitchen faucet at no charge. Highly recommend this good gentlemen!

Came out same day to fix a leak in our kitchen sink. Very professional, left no mess. Took the time to help me locate the shut off valve for the new home and made sure I was comfortable with how to turn it off. Will use again for any plumbing issues should they arise.
Best plumbing in Tennessee no one else even comes close
Great experience. Great service at a fair price. Mark is a good plumber and a nice guy. Came a good distance to help us out. Great job.
Mark was responsive and very professional. He completed the job when he said he would. Highly recommend!

Great experience with Mark. He came out and was very honest with us. After he installed the hot water heater, the water heater had trouble getting up to temperature later that evening. He volunteered to come out at 10 pm that night to look at it agin. We settled on him returning in the morning to check the issue. He came out the very next day to fix the issue and even reached out several weeks later to make sure things were still running right. I highly recommend him for your plumbing needs!

We had a clogged pipe under the house. Mr Harrison was abel to figure it out and fix it quickly. I had called other plumbers but all were gonna be at least a week to help my family. Mr Harrison came the same day i called and fix our issue. Highly recommend will definitely use in the future.
I have had to call Mark twice now,  both times he came as soon as he could and got my problem solved, I would recommend Harrison plumbing to anyone who needs work done.
Mark is awesome! Fixed a nasty pipe break under my home and I couldn?t be happier with results and fair price!  I recommend him highly!
Mark, did a great job for us and was willing to help on a side issue while he was here!

I 10/10 recommend Harrisons Plumbing. Our water heater was leaking and Mark made a special trip between jobs to come out and look at it. The company I called first couldn't come out for two days! Thankfully, Mark was able to fix it on the spot but he told me if it needed to be replaced he would have made sure it got done at some point that day. He didn't want us to have to be without hot water all weekend. He also took a look at an ongoing issue we had and gave an honest assessment. Mark Harrison was very nice and professional and extremely reasonable. I absolutely will contact him the next time we need a plumber!

We had a toilet backing up on Saturday & a snake wouldn?t do the job. Called Mark at Harrison?s Plumbing & he understood our urgency & came within a few hours! Unstopped the outside pipe & had the toilet working in no time. Easy to work with, responsible price & I Highly recommend him!
Great job, very professional, very responsive.
Couldn?t have asked for better service. Would definitely recommend him to anyone needing this type of work.
Mr. Harrison performs excellent work.  Knowledgeable!  Efficient!  Great quality and value!  Have used him numerous times and will again!

reviews.reviewText: This review is about the owner. I called about an issue we were having and the owner informed me he was out of town with family and the rest of his team was booked, but he gave me the names of 3 other plumbers he recommends.  He could have just said he was unavailable and ended the call, but he still tried to help. That level of professionalism should be the norm, but sadly, is not. It was probably a small thing to him, but meant a lot to me.

We used Hatcher plumbing for a total revamp of our 1960?s house?s plumbing. He gutted the old drains and replaced all of the cast iron with a completely redesigned pvc drain system all the way to the septic tank.  He designed a new vent system so that no pipes would show up through the roof sections at the front of the house. He also created a new water supply system throughout the house using PEX. He even replaced some pvc on our pool pump! Sims gave a lot of great advice along the way and helped us overcome several obstacles in our remodeling. We will be having him return shortly to hook up all of the fixtures as soon as the drywall is complete. Sims is very personable and passionate about doing quality work.  Hatcher Plumbing has done us a fantastic service!
Very professional and quality work! If you want a bad plumber Mr. Hatcher ain't it. Hes a good plumber with good work ethic, I definitely recommend him!
Great service

reviews.reviewText: Jed was wonderful. He was able to come out the same day I called. His price was affordable and his work was great. He was patient and kind. There were issues with the pipes and valves after the installation and he made a trip back just to ensure that everything was working properly. He completed the job efficiently and was extremely professional. If you need someone dependable and well equipped, this is your guy!
Zed did a fantastic job! He came out quickly and repaired my toilet and provided a quick clean-up. If you want fast, efficient, professional, quality service call him.
Jed was available when we needed his service. He was on-time and did a great job!! I greatly appreciate his help today!!
Jed was very nice and got my hot water heater fully replaced within hours! His prices were very reasonable and would definitely use him again!!
Jed was very professional and did a great job.  Will use him again.

Cannot thank Jed enough! I had a toilet problem at my rental property and he fixed it so fast! When I called, he was courteous and knowledgeable. He came when he said he would and prices were very reasonable. Thank you Jed for the work you do! Will definitely be on my list of trusted resources. Will use again in the future!

Having a dependable plumber that treats you like family instead of a number is invaluable. Jed was thorough and professional when fixing my garbage disposal. I highly recommend Healthy plumbing to anyone who wants the job done right and in a timely manner.

I would recommend Healthy Plumbing to anyone who needs a plumber. From the first phone call until he completed the identification of a leak in my home and estimation of the repair, he was professional and honest. I?m thankful for his quick response time too!

reviews.reviewText: Excellent work today on gas line issue. Will use again, very professional

They were simply fantastic in every way!! I was visiting from out of town to help my son, who is a student at Auburn, get some repairs finished at his home. They were extremely responsive and prompt with the plumbing work I needed accomplished. They also went above and beyond by helping me find someone who could do some flooring work, after several failed attempts from myself to get the work done.

Blake, Wade and Brittany are the best!

Very Professional and Very nice people!

Answered all my concerns, fixed all issues and disposed of old materials.

What a great Plumbing Company!

Thanks to you all at Hobbs Plumping.

Extremely pleased with our experience!  We needed a cartridge replaced in our bathtub faucet, but we couldn't get the old cartridge out.  Brittany was kind and helpful on the phone and was able to send someone out very quickly.  Bryan was so polite and friendly and efficient!  He did a fantastic job explaining why it was stuck, what he was doing, and the potential issues they could run into.  They prepared me for the worst but delivered the best!  Completed the whole project, including travel time to get the replacement part, in an hour and a half.  Would definitely recommend Hobbs!!
They arrived at the earliest available and quickly fixed my toilet at a fair price.
Great work, very transparent and VERY professional and reasonable! Would definitely recommend

I called Hobbs Plumbing spoke with a nice lady named Brittany she scheduled me for the same day I called. A very pleasant and knowledgeable young man named Bryan came out assessed our situation. We had a loud noise in our water pipes, I called it  the ?dinosaur?. Our house is 30 years old.  He checked our water pressure it was high.  I suspected it was our PRV and it was.  Bryan relocated our PRV near our water meter instead of at our house in the crawl space. I?m very pleased with the service we received. I will definitely  will use Hobbs Plumbing when needed again.

I would like to thank the customer service of Hobbs Plumbing. I had no hot water and the prospects of getting it fixed was a week or longer. I talked with Brittney and she said if she could get someone out earlier she would call me back. Brittney called back and said a technician had finished a job early and would send him out. Bryan arrived and fixed the problem and some others he found. Thank you Bryan for being so helpful and courteous. Would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing if you have a plumbing issue.
J. Givins

"I would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing LLC, to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika/Lee County area. I was out searching for a plumber to do some repairs at a rental property of mine . On my way home about to end my search for that today, I saw a Hobbs Plumbing Van in a stores parking lot . As I pulled into the parking  lot this young man walked out, I explained my situation to him(Bryan), he said yes we can take care of that for you. This company , were professional, diagnosed the problem quickly, and finished the job in a short amount of time. Thank you again Hobbs Plumbing LLC, for doing such a GREAT job.

I would give Hobbs Plumbing one million stars if I could.  Yes, one million! We had an issue at my elderly parents' home.  Setting up the appointment was very easy, thanks to Brittany, who was so pleasant, helpful and efficient.  Brian arrived at their home and the pleasant experience continued.  He was also so nice and professional and got the job done! Trying to find the right plumber to get the job done correctly can be stressful.  Hobbs Plumbing got the job done, with no stress for me.  I'm grateful.
Excellent work highly recommend
We have dealt with Hobbs for our required annual backflow test for many years. He is always very responsive and polite, and the price is reasonable.
Blake was punctual, courteous, and I thought their price was fair. I highly recommend them!!!

I will never have anyone else fix any plumbing related issues at my house ever again other Hobbs Plumbing. I have had to call them multiple times for different things going on in my older house and they have come and fixed everything extremely quickly. Blake has always been very sweet and patient explaining everything to me. He not only found a rare part for my shower due to old pipes but made sure to give me the part info should I ever need another, but his company also came out to my house two days after Christmas to fix a busted pipe as planned but they also fixed my sink as well that they were not told about during the call and showed no irritation with this. So many other times they have come out due to old pipes that they have always gone above and beyond for my family. Highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing for any and all plumbing needs, They are amazing!

reviews.reviewText: Very professional young men service my tank I highly recommend this company.
Wonderful and helpful
Very efficient and courteous
Next day service (at least in my case) with competitive service rates, professional/courteous staff. Would not hesitate to call them again if needed.

I called first thing Monday morning and inquired about having my tank pumped. They called me back 2 hours later and said they were on there way. They beat me to the house and I only had a 20 minute drive. Eric located the tank and was able to dig it up, empty it and re-cover in 90 minutes. He was very polite and had a good joking personality. A lady called me about an hour later and took a my payment over the phone. I can recommend them!
Eric was prompt, courteous, and knowledgeable. Less than 3 hours between calling and them being on scene. Recommending to others!
Awesome experience. Came to my house on time and my septic system was able to be repaired by night fall.

When our septic tank backed up into our house we called multiple companies for an emergency call. By the time I found Ikard I was just praying for someone  to answer the phone and be able to come quickly. Not only did I get a person on the phone they were great they were able to get us on the schedule  the following morning.  The guys who came to the house were polite and got right to work. They cleaned up the yard nicely as well. We will definitely use this company again.

I want to Ikard for the work performed on my field line recently. Most importantly,? I appreciate the integrity displayed doing the job that was needed instead of doing the job at a higher price for an effort not necessary.? Others may have chosen the higher priced-unneeded work. They chose to do the right thing while saving me a significant amount of money in the process.

reviews.reviewText:
Mr. Lawson was able to come out quick and fixed our issue with ease. Perfect man to call for fast, efficient plumbing work at a reasonable cost.
(Also his responses to 1 star comments are hilarious)
I know who I?ll be contacting with any plumbing needs from now on. Jeremy was detailed, honest and thorough in his work and at a fair price. 10/10 recommend!!
I?ve used Lawson Plumbing twice and both times I got quick service, with everything fixed to my satisfaction.

Jeremy came late in the evening and found why the sink and shower were backing up. A temporary solution was set up with plans to come back on Saturday. He was very knowledgeable and a pleasure to have service our home.

We called JW Lawson Plumbing Tuesday evening and Jeremy came the next day to help with an outside water meter issue. He was able to identify it within a few minutes and fix the problem. He?s very knowledgeable and a Great Plumber!  We are so very happy he was able to help us so quickly and will definitely keep his number for all plumbing related issues going forward. Thank you Jeremy!!

Highly recommend this company. We had a massive water leak. Gentleman came quickly and fixed the problem. Excellent work, very professional, and courteous.

Lawson Plumbing will be my go-to for any and all future plumbing needs. Jeremy came out on a Sunday morning, was very professional and courteous, charged a fair price, and did excellent work in a timely manner. Will use again.

Very professional, got to the house promptly and fixed all the issues I had, will continue to use his services in the future, highly recommended

heroImages.text: Jason's Drain Service is your top choice for leaks, drips, and full-scale plumbing projects done right the first time.
Cold showers are history when Jason's Drain Service handles your water heater repairs with speed and precision.
From minor fixes to complete remodels, Jason's Drain Service keeps your water flowing smoothly day in and day out.

reviews.reviewText: Jason and his crew replaced our water heater a few weeks ago. The unit is performing perfectly since it was installed. They came the same day I called and did the work for a very reasonable price.

I was looking for a good honest plumber and Jason had some really good reviews so we gave him a try and he lived up to those reviews.  He worked us in quickly, communicated when he was running a little behind.  Jason and his crew were very friendly and professional, got the job done and the price was reasonable!

Jason's Drain Service did some work on our older home that included replacing a drain pipe under the house and installing a new pressure control valve. Jason Hunter and his team were friendly, professional and did a great job. If you are looking for a true professional with over 30 years experience who will show up when he promises and get your job done efficiently, give Jason a call. I will definitely call him again when needed.

I called Jason Drain service due to a slowly draining kitchen sink. Sadly, it is a major problem that we won't get fixed until we absolutely have no choice but to do so, in the future. This is at a house that we just bought in another neighborhood. Anyway, Jason and his partner were just the best!!!   Unrelated to drains, my husband was trying to pick at a mound of concrete that the former owners poured onto the driveway. They got out their jack hammer like tool and helped him out before they left.

I recently used Jason?s Drain Service for 2 jobs.   Don?t let the name fool you, they do much more than drains. They replaced a hot water heater (job 1) and replaced the cartridges in both of my bathtub faucets (job 2).  Both faucets are working perfectly now and we have plenty of hot water. Their pricing is reasonable.

However, the best thing about them is their willingness to work with your schedule and punctuality. For both jobs, I asked them to come on a specific date. They can on the date requested and were here shortly after 8:00.  This is a drastic change from my previous plumber who was totally unreliable.

Jason also did not mind me standing over his shoulder and asking questions. He even stayed a couple of extra minutes to make sure that one faucet stopped dripping.

His prices are reasonable.  He is *extremely* fair with his pricing.

He is also very helpful with general information without charging for just a 5 minute conversation.

EDIT: I just used him for a third job.  He again was very punctual which was amazing given we are in the middle of a very hard freeze.  His price for today's job was more than fair.

I highly recommend Jason?s Drain Service.
Did great and quick work on a leak I had outside going under the sidewalk. Thanks!
Honest, quick, and great pricing!
Excellent and trustworthy service. Highly recommend.

This is the plumber I've been looking for all these years. For real, Jason's drain was the 6th plumber I tried. Some of the others were bad, some were alright, but Jason was the only one that was great. It is such a relief to finally find a plumber I can trust and rely on. Thank you Jason!
He had great communication skills and got to my job in a very prompt manner. Perfect work and very reasonable price. Would not hesitate to use him again. 7 out of 5 stars.
These guys are great. Very professional, reasonable price, on time, quick and clean. If needed will definitely use again!

I was very happy that I called  Jason drain service. A very  professional  service. I am well pleased with the service that was given. Jason is a very nice kind person and I recommend this business. Thanks Jason.
Very professional plumbing company.  Very honest and came on time, did a great job, cleaned up afterwards.  I recommend highly.

reviews.reviewText: I love their work!! Love the dedication

I had a terrible leak in my home and it caused the plumber to have to cut holes in the ceiling and walls in order to locate the leak.  The water damaged my upstairs and downstairs flooring.  I called Jay's and not only did they jump right in to help, they completed this complex job in just a week.  They also worked with the Insurance company on my behalf for my claim.  They did a Great Job!!!!  My house looks great.  They even removed the popcorn texture in my Dining room and Kitchen and it looks awesome.  I recommend them to anyone that needs their help in water damage repair or any other repairs or improvements.  They also Really care for their customers.  Thanks to Jay's Home Improvement for making my home livable again!
They do a very good job and above all, they are very responsible, I loved their work, I would definitely work with them again ?

Jay did a wonderful job on my floors.  I had a flood in my entire home and he jumped in  and got my job done very quick and it looks beautiful!  Thank you, Jay for a job well done!  I really appreciate you!
The best ever around he will get the job done in a timely matter very professional if you need anything done to your home call him

reviews.reviewText:

Curtis did an excellent job on my home! It?s 100 years old and had some wood that needed replacement, window work was needed and it desperately needed a new paint job. It looks so amazing now! Curtis is courteous, professional, is on time and cleans up afterward. His prices are fair and I am definitely calling him again for my roof and any other needed repairs. Thanks, love the results and it exceeded my expectations!

Superb. I've used other carpenters/ contractors for various projects. By far, he is the best. His work is excellent and his prices are better. One guy quoted me $1500.00 for a three foot ramp for my shed
John replaced the ramp, removed a bifold mirror door, installed a bifold wooden door, installed two shelves in my closet, and hauled away the mess for $755.00.
I wouldn't think of calling anyone else to do any carpentry work. He's the best. Period.

Mr. John and his team were outstanding! Very prompt in communication and detailed in his work! He truly cares for his team as he was giving some training tips to his helper. I'd recommend him and the services he provides to EVERYONE! A+?
Thank you for your great work on my fireplace I?m really enjoying it

John is officially our go to for handyman needs. He?s knowledgeable, professional, and takes pride in his work. He has also been extremely accommodating for my family fitting is in at the last minute during the holidays. The best in Columbus.

John is not only reliable, he?s fast, affordable, and does excellent work. I?ve used his business several times, he communicates very well and discusses options and finds ways to save money where we can. 10/10 recommend him for any home repairs you need!
Awesome work, fast and clean? Thank you for the work John,

We're new to the area and needed some maintenance items and repairs taken care of for our new home. We searched around and found John's Home Services. From the initial contact forward, the experience has all been great. John and his team are easy to work with and we have been really pleased with the results.

John is both personable and extremely knowledgeable. He has been very helpful in suggesting changes to the approach on the repairs (I feel he saved us quite a bit) and also things we weren't aware of that should be addressed before larger repairs are necessary. John was very thorough and detail oriented with the work performed, and again, we were happy with the quality and results.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend John and his team.

John?s Home Services  completed several home repairs and projects for me. They were punctual and professional. John offered advice and alternative solutions to complete projects at a minimum cost. I will definitely be calling them again. I highly recommend them for your home improvement and maintenance needs.
John was a pleasure to work with and his rates were extremely reasonable. He showed up on time as promised and showed up quickly. I highly recommend him!

Reached out to John to repair a section of baseboard that our puppies destroyed. He responded quickly and setup a time that fit my schedule to come give us a quote. His quote was reasonable for the work required and then we scheduled a time for him to come out and complete the job. The board he originally brought did not match exactly so he worked with a fellow contractor to find the exact piece (at no extra charge to us) and made the repair/replacement in a timely manner. He and his assistant did a fantastic job and you cannot even tell where the old boards end and the new boards start, perfect color matching and craftsmanship. They were on time, courteous, and efficient. We cannot wait to hire John and his team for more projects around our home!

Great service at a reasonable price. Helped to fix up a home on a tight schedule. Showed up at 5:30 AM to work and get the job completed in a timely manner. reviews.reviewText: My house is 60 years old. The cast iron plumbing was shot. These guys came out and quoted a great deal. The plumbing was pulled out and replaced with PVC. They even replaced my kitchen faucet and garbage disposal. The one thing, they are definately lacking in, is COMMUNICATION. If you say, You'll be there at 9:00, and won't be text or call. This was the one big aggravating factor. Other than that, there's only a few more things I'd suggest. Buy Booties that you can pull over your shoes. If you've been under a house, in a protective suit, wearing booties inside would cut down on cleanup. Other than this they were GREAT! I'll use them on my next issue if anything comes up.
Greg and his crew went above and beyond. Highly recommend!

I highly recommend KG Plumbing Services of NWFL.

I called on a Friday about a leaking water heater. Brandon came out to take a look within an hour. He shut it down and started the draining process while he went to his office to see if he had the right water heater to replace it. He returned and worked hard to get the old heater out and the new one in. I had hot water by the late afternoon.

Brandon is amazing!! He called me one day, came out on time exactly when he said he would the next day, found the issue, and contacted our reality company for us and got approval to fix the issue. Went and got the parts, came back and fixed the issue the same day. While here we noticed under our kitchen sink leaking, and he gladly fixed that for us too!! He is really professional, nice, and informative!!

reviews.reviewText:
Yes, completed a replacement of two Moen 1224 bathroom faucet cartridges in a very timely and professional manner on the 12th of April 2024. Thanks, for the excellent plumbing service as before.
Thanks if I could give a Ten Star rating I certainly would. Case in point: after my neighbor called us while on vacation in New Jersey my pressure relief regulator went out and burst the L shape PVC connectors after a referral from one of my plumbers Mr. Hays we contacted Mr. Joey at Linbrooke Plumbing and with less than an hour he repaired my leak and installed new piping after I was told by another plumbing corporation (Ben Franklin); it would cost over nine hundred dollars to make this repair. Bottomline; cost of their repair was half of what Ben Franklin wanted to charge!
Thanks so much for what yall do; excellent customer service above and beyond the call of plumbing.
They are awesome.

The best plumbing company ever. I was without any water due to a major break. They arrived in 2 hours and repaired everything. It required he belly crawl and work in a very tight, very wet area. Work was completed quickly and all is 100%. I was very surprised at his reasonable price. They are professional and I appreciate their promptness. Highly recommend this company.
Came right out to fix the leak, they were very nice and explained everything to me. They are also reasonably priced.

After calling several plumber with our drain backing up, Joey was the only one that answered and came to help.  After hearing our problem, he honestly infirm me that he did not have the right tools to handle my problem and gave me a few trusted septic tank recommendations. He did not charge me for coming house. He gave me some good advice. Joey was very nice and informative.
Linbrooke Plumbing has come to the rescue more than one time for our family! Always kind, polite, and professional! They are very fairly priced and through when making repairs. Thank you!!!

reviews.reviewText: We were dealing with a heavily leaking tub faucet at a rental property. Paul was quick to answer his phone and get to the property to stop to leak. I will be using him for future jobs.
Great service.  We had a toilet replaced as well as all new knobs for a bathtub.  Great business, very knowledgeable and affordable.  Would highly recommend.
Awesome service. I highly recommend this company.

Paul Evans of LT Drain and Small Repair was able to repair my broken faucet and he also did a great job installing a new faucet.  He was punctual for each visit. His communication skilss are fantastic and he itemizes his invoice in clear detail of what you are charged. He even gives you a warranty on your service.  I give him 5 stars!!!

I also just had him out to replace the toilet in one of my bathrooms and both of the toilets in my mother's house. Top notch work from start to finish.  He does great work and I still give him five stars.

Mr. Paul did an excellent job at a property i had recently moved into, replacing a faulty pipe and valve combo that was leaking and running up quite a water bill. reviews.reviewText: 9/1/23 Mr McGuire came out (Goat Rock area)  due to alarm sounding on my septic. Very quick response time. Super friendly service. Reasonably priced. Highly recommend and will use them in the future.

Mr. Ed came out to service my septic tank in Feb 2023.... Not only is  Mr. Ed and his crew professional,Mr.Ed is very personable and friendly....  I  highly recommend M&M for your septic tank needs....

Mr Ed I'm assuming the owner, came out this morning 02/03/2023 to Fort Mitchell to service my septic tank, he was very nice,professional and thorough, did a great job.... He wasn't satisfied, until I was satisfied.... Thanks,Mr. Ed GREAT JOB,l definitely will be recommending to my friends and family...
They were very quick and done a great job.
They are fast, personable and professional. They also, recommended and installed Tank Risers for easy maintenance in the future.

5 Star they always find the source of the problem. Over 10 years I have had 2 issues with my septic pump. The first problem everyone told me I needed a new pump and It couldn't  be repaired. M & M came out and repaired the pump because it just had something wrapped up in the pump saving me hundreds. The next issue, others said we needed a new pump and I called M & M they came out and found my breaker went bad. I will never call another when I have an issue again. They are the most honest, always professional and polite, get to the root of the problem, and find the best solution saving home owners money.
Good customer service.  Fast and dependable!!

reviews.reviewText: My grandmother had been using the same plumber for years. He went out of business. I called Spencer. He was able to go out a day earlier than was scheduled & make repairs  the same day. He was professional & very reasonably priced. Will definitely be using him in the future.

Two hours later Spencer called to let me know he had it done and the contractor was back to work. I have had many experiences with tradesmen over the years. This, by far, was the best. I would never use another plumber besides Marble City!

reviews.reviewText:
When my pipe burst I panicked assuming it was going to cost me a fortune to fix.  I'm a first time home owner and this was my first issue I have had to have repaired.  My home warranty company set up my appointment with Mikes.

Not only were they fast at making it to my house they were lightning fast fixing the pipe!  The man that did the repair reassured me that he was going to do all he could to get it taken care of as soon as possible, because he understands I have a small child at home and being without water isn't an option.

This was my first experience having to use a plumber but they have def won my business for life. I GOT MY WATER BACK WOOOOO  LOL!
My go to plumber and electrician! Good service

We had a great experience with Mike's plumbing at our business office! We were having issues with our toilets, and both times we had to call, they came out same day to help! They were very knowledgeable and helped us figure out the bigger issue that was going on! They even ended up having to have the city come out to evaluate something, which they set up themselves and even waited for them to come! Their scheduler was also very nice and quick to respond!
GREAT WORK. DID WHAT NO ONE ELSE HAD BEEN ABLE TO DO.

If you need quality service with the most genuine people you will ever meet, I highly recommend Mike's Plumbing and Electric. They are so nice, responsive, and get the job done right. Thank you for fixing our plumbing issue that has lingered for some time. We appreciate your assistance!

I can?t say enough great things about this company! I appreciate the hard work and professionalism of the plumbing team that came to re-route my pipes that were leaking in my concrete slab. Mr. Mike and his crew did an amazing job!! I called Mrs. Kacie, who was extremely nice and very helpful with scheduling my repair. I will definitely contact Mike's Plumbing & Electric again.
Quick to respond, greatest employees , and very reasonable price , you cant ask for more!
Great service.  Did the work promptly as scheduled.  My compliments to all the crew.
Fast, Professional and Knowledgeable. Definitely a company I will do business with again.
Highly Recommend! They have done multiple jobs for me and have been very professional and fair pricing.
On time and they know what they?re doing ? and gets it done ? prices are very fare !!!
Great service and good people to deal with!

Had two waterlines bust in the ceiling . Looked up Mike's Plumbing and Electric in Ashford , Alabama and give them a call .The lady that answered the phone was very professional and very nice when telling her my problem .  Mike came out and assessed the problem very quickly . Had to to have two waterlines rerun in the ceiling and I also needed two toilets replaced . Mike was very nice and professional . Gave me a good price on taking care of my problems also and the guys that came out to do the work , you just could not ask for anyone better . Did a great job on everything and was gone in less than a day . I would recommend these people on any plumbing and electrical problem you might have . Thank You A Bunch Mike and your Crew !!!!

reviews.reviewText: What a great service,everything perfect

Great people. Had a water heater installed by them and they did a great job. When the gas valve failed in less than a year (manufacturer defect, not their fault) they worked hard to make sure I didn't have to pay a penny, even though the manufacturer was out of stock on replacement parts due to the shipping and labor crisis. They worked with the supplier to make a warranty claim to replace the entire heater instead. Highly recommended, honest people. Will be calling back in the future.

We have used Morrison plumbing on multiple occasions for work on our homes in Chelsea and Greystone.  The team is very professional, on time, friendly and calls back after the work is complete to make sure we are satisfied.  I highly recommend this team.

reviews.reviewText:
Discovered my septic system was backing up on Saturday and called Mr Paton and he said he could be at my house at 7 AM on Sunday to pump my tank. Arrived on time and completed cleaning out my septic system and a short time at a fair price especially for a Sunday service call.
Very professional and knowledgeable of his business.
I would highly recommend him and will use him in the future if needed.
Payton's Septic is super professional,  courteous and his prices are extremely reasonable. He will undoubtedly be your best choice for your septic needs.

Great experience! He arrived when he said he would and was very professional. He took his time to make sure our tank was emptied thoroughly. It was apparent they really care about the quality of their work. Would highly recommend!

At 3:30 pm on a Thursday afternoon I noticed my yard had sewage water bubbling from where my septic tank is. I called Mr. Payton and explained what I saw and that I needed to get it pumped ASAP due to having a party the next day. After a full day's schedule Mr. Payton and crew showed up at 7:00 pm pumped and inspected my system.
Payton's have my business from here on out.

Payton's Septic Services is TOP NOTCH!   Mr. Payton and his crew are professionals of the highest quality.  They showed up right on time, did a fantastic job on our septic tank and the price we were quoted was the price we paid!   My husband and I HIGHLY recommend calling Payton's Septic Services! #veryprofessional

I give Pickle Septic Tank & Plumbing five stars for the outstanding service they provided me. In the past, I had a different septic tank service come out for a pump out. After few minutes, they told me that tank was under my driveway and they couldn?t help me. Devin and his crew were servicing my son?s tank and I mention this experience to him. He assured me that he could help me. After investigation, he discovered that my tank was NOT under the drive. He serviced the tank and it is now operating properly. In addition, my son was very pleased with his service. I highly recommend Pickle, first class service!

Best experience I have ever had in dealing with any kind of repairs.  I highly recommend them for any septic or plumbing needs.  Thank you Pickle for your service.

We hired a company before him that charged us $725 and after two visits of un clogging the pipes. The day the previous plumber  left the toilets' were bubbling again. So never fixed.

reviews.reviewText: Very professional, fast, honest, friendly.
Absolutely the best and most professional plumber.  He worked us in right away.  Quick, efficient and friendly.  Thanks Dan.
Plumber Dan was great! He fixed two leaks in separate locations within an hour. Very professional and friendly. Would definitely use him for future projects!

Dan came out after hours on the same day we contacted him to help us out. He was quick and it was obvious he knew what he was doing. The issue was resolved in under an hour and we couldn't be happier. We'll be calling him again for future plumbing projects/needs.
I found Dan to be very easy guy to work with. He replaced my faulty shutoff valve which was leaking under the house. He did a pro job and didn?t make a mess.

Dan arrived on time and did a great job.  Very friendly as well!
Highly recommend.

Dan was very easy to deal with! Showed up on time, did the work, left everything in good shape and at a reasonable price. I don?t know what else you could ask for. And he?s a super nice guy! Highly recommend.

Dan went out of his way to take care of my issue. I had two toilets dripping down on the ceiling on the floor below. He drove quite a distance to help.  I just moved to Alabama and my house is on a slab and doesn't have the best access points to just switch something out. So much you find out after the close of the house I guess.

Dan was able to assess the problem and tackled it. You're in good hands with Dan!
My go to for all my service and new construction plumbing.

Wonderful & friendly customer service - it was less than 3 hours from the time I called to request a technician to having our sink operational again! We definitely will be repeat customers for any plumbing needs we have in the future!

PlumberDan is the BEST!

I would call him again.

reviews.reviewText: Very professional, fast, honest, friendly.
Absolutely the best and most professional plumber.  He worked us in right away.  Quick, efficient and friendly.  Thanks Dan.
Plumber Dan was great! He fixed two leaks in separate locations within an hour. Very professional and friendly. Would definitely use him for future projects!

Dan came out after hours on the same day we contacted him to help us out. He was quick and it was obvious he knew what he was doing. The issue was resolved in under an hour and we couldn't be happier. We'll be calling him again for future plumbing projects/needs.
I found Dan to be very easy guy to work with. He replaced my faulty shutoff valve which was leaking under the house. He did a pro job and didn?t make a mess.

Dan arrived on time and did a great job.  Very friendly as well!
Highly recommend.

Dan was very easy to deal with! Showed up on time, did the work, left everything in good shape and at a reasonable price. I don?t know what else you could ask for. And he?s a super nice guy! Highly recommend.

Dan went out of his way to take care of my issue. I had two toilets dripping down on the ceiling on the floor below. He drove quite a distance to help.  I just moved to Alabama and my house is on a slab and doesn't have the best access points to just switch something out. So much you find out after the close of the house I guess.

Dan was able to assess the problem and tackled it. You're in good hands with Dan!
My go to for all my service and new construction plumbing.

Wonderful & friendly customer service - it was less than 3 hours from the time I called to request a technician to having our sink operational again! We definitely will be repeat customers for any plumbing needs we have in the future!

PlumberDan is the BEST!
He immediately texted me back when I left a message and was at my house within 2 hours.  It?s difficult to find anyone in this area who returns calls and actually shows up! Especially when I?m only here part time. So happy he was my first call.  I won?t use anyone else!!!

Started hearing horn sounds from the pipes that was getting louder and louder.  We were going to have company and needed this fixed asap. I Called Plumber Dan and they came out and fixed it on the same day, even worked in the rain to get the job done. Would highly recommend and I would call them again if I need future plumbing work.

I called PlumberDan because we discovered a leaking pipe at our office after the freeze.  He was able to work us into an already busy schedule and quickly repair our problem to get us back up and running so that we could reopen.  All of his communications were prompt and professional.  I would call him again.
Very knowledgeable and straightforward. Prompt and treats customers like they matter.. Highly recommend and will be my go to plumber from here on out
Plumber Dan is awesome! We've used their services several times now for different issues.  They are courteous, fairly priced,  prompt,  and experts in their field.  They're my plumber of choice.

reviews.reviewText: We drilled through a water line on a job and the owner of this company was out there in just a few hours! The job was a headache and ran late but these guys really came through and helped us make a great impression on our customer. Thank you Joe and Zack!

Very professional and on time! I spoke to several plumbers in the Lanett area and it seemed more of a burden to get someone to come out. These guys were responsive, honest, fast, and professional. Highly recommend!
Nice and honest people and reasonable prices,highly recommend!!
Highly recommended professional plumbing Joe Duncan came ready to pump four feet of water from my basement and installed a new water heater in 4 hours i had hot water. Very honest man Joe Duncan.
Will definitely use them again very knowledgeable friendly and fair pricing

This is the best company ever. I am in the process of buying a house and needed a plumber to go do an inspection and he was very honest about what he found out and the prices aren't too bad either!!! Will definitely call for future work!!
Great customer service and priced reasonably for the consumer. This company does great work and stands behind their work.
I appreciated Joe's professional advice, expertise and manner. I will certainly call him again.

On time for estimate Joe was professional and? honest, Hired Joe on the spot he was able to fix our leaking Pipe. We had been without water for the weekend  He explained why the pipe was leaking and? showed us other area that had been affected by water damage.? Correct diagnosis and  repair. Will recommend Professional Plumbers? Service?? to all our colleagues.
Thank you Guys The Woods Family

Joe replaced my water heater right after Christmas in 2016. He just did some minor work on my tub today. I have had experience with Roto Rooter trying to charge me extra for things that were not at all needed or related. Joe in both situations only did what was needed, and while he could easily have told me more was needed just to get money out of me, he was honest and didn't overcharge me. Integrity and skill are lost arts these days. I will continue to go with Professional Plumbing and recommend them to my friends and family.

Scheduling was easy. We did it via text message. They confirmed the appointment the day before via text and also texted when he was enroute to my house.
I had my hot and cold shut-off valves under my kitchen sink replaced. While he was here, he adjusted / inspected a couple small things in my bathroom.
He was referred to me by a neighbor. Professional behavior and polite.
I would use again.
Excellent, professional and timely service as usual.  These guys (and gals) are great!

I?ve used Quality Plumbing Service numerous times at different homes I?ve owned around Birmingham. It?s hard finding someone you can trust to do repairs. My wife and I have both recommended their services to our parents. The work has always been excellent and I always feel the price is very competitive.

Quality Plumbing (Russell Fuller) has done about a dozen jobs for our family.   He has always provided exceptional service at a reasonable price.  He has always responded promptly and is both professional and pleasant!

Fantastic service.  We discovered a leak on Sunday night.  These folks were booked up through Tuesday, but scheduled us for Wednesday morning (first available).  Tracy talked us through how to carefully manage the leak until they could get out and replace the unit.  Would call them first for any plumbing project!
Russell is the best there is, period. I would recommend him for all of your plumbing needs

reviews.reviewText: I had an amazing experience with this company! We had previously used another company and will never make that mistake again. Richard Restoration will always be our first choice from now on. The customer service was top-notch, I highly recommend them to anyone looking for excellent service. I was impressed by their commitment to going the extra mile for me. If I could give 10 Stars I would ! Walked us through the whole process and explained everything to us on a level we understood !

I've utilized this company several times for various reasons over the past year, and they have exceeded my expectations each time. I couldn't be more satisfied. Thank you, Richard's Restoration. I will definitely use your services for future needs.
Professional and timely service. 10/10 work, highly recommended. Will be using again for future restoration needs!
Richard and his crew were very professional, friendly and quick. They did two bathrooms for me and if I need more work done to Amy other rooms I'm calling Richard Restoration for sure!

Richard Restoration did an amazing job restoring and remodeling my kitchen and bathroom after water damage due to a leaking pipe. Richie was wonderful to work with and handled all of the insurance claim information, which made the process a lot less stressful for me. His crew was professional, respectful, knowledgeable, and fast. Richie came the same day the leak and damage was found and kept me informed throughout the whole process. He went above and beyond to make sure that my home was properly restored. I love my new kitchen and bathroom! I highly recommend Richards Restoration.
Fantastic job working with my insurance to fix our bathroom after a leak!

This is the best team for all your restoration needs!  Our entire home flooded from a busted pipe upstairs.  Richard and his team responded quickly and they helped us through the entire process.  Great quality work, fast, dependable and honest!  We couldn?t be happier with our home!

Richard's restoration came in at a timely rate, assessed the situation and mitigated my issue within hours of me calling . They took every precaution necessary to keep me and my family safe and taken care of throughout the whole process . Very proffesional business to do work with. They handle everything for you even down to the phone calls. I highly recommend.

Richard Restoration helped our church (Safe Harbor Church of God in Rainbow City) in a very timely manner when a pipe froze and burst on Christmas of 2022. Their company was prompt and professional. They had several people working and therefore were able to finish the work much faster than we anticipated. Besides remediation, they painted walls, repaired sheet rock, and installed flooring. Everything was done with excellence. They even helped us when dealing with the insurance adjuster. We highly recommend Richard Restoration.

Richard Restoration responded quickly to my house when i had a leak and it flooded.  They took care of the problem and remodeled my house. I couldn?t be happier with the outcome.  I appreciate them!   They did such a good job.  Thanks, Richard Restoration! I?m one happy customer and highly recommend them for any of your restoration needs

reviews.reviewText: Quick service

I want to give a shout out to Ron for changing out my faucet and putting in new and fixing the leak under my kitchen sink. I definitely will be using him again. Also when I called I got his voice mail he immediately called me back and came out within an hour. Thank you Ron for your great service and quick response!??

Ron has been in the plumbing trade for over 40yrs.  He was a referral from our HOA President, and consequently used primarily in our subdivision servicing $300k-600k+ homes and investment properties.  Ron?s time in the plumbing industry, relationships, and time in the community make him an invaluable resource.  Over the past several months and especially during COVID shortages he has provided what seems to be an invaluable resource and that is peace of mind.  I can ask him to resolve anything from replacing a garbage disposal to fixing a fireplace (gas pipe) without having to follow-up with him.  He gets the job done, often goes beyond expectation, and is quick to communicate?even when he just got out of the hospital.  I love this guy, and he reminds me why I miss my Southern Americans and their gracious inviting charm! -David Lanfkord Maj, USAF (ret)
Great services,  He show up when I couldn't get anyone else. He's been so helpful to my husband and I

reviews.reviewText: Called Monday schedule for Wednesday arrived on time. Mr. Michael was super professional and informative. The price was the best in town. Definitely will use them again and refer my friends and family.
Great service and friendly folks! I would definitely recommend Royal Flush!
I called Royal Flush to clean out our septic and they did a wonderful job. They were very friendly and professional. I would recommend them to everyone.
On time friendly and very professional
Love them! They went above and beyond to get the job done! 100% satisfaction!

2nd time customer. They are on time type of people which is always appreciated. Serviced our system pretty quick and packed everything back down. The most reasonable prices out there with quality work.  10/10 Good folks

Great Service!! We had an 8:00 appt. We received a call stating they were on their way. They arrived on time and were very professional. The job was completed in a professional and timely manner. If/when we have our tank serviced again we will definitely be calling them.

First off, my wife and I had the total nightmare of our septic system suddenly failing and we were not able to take a shower, flush the toilet, do laundry, or dishes.  Furthermore, we had no idea where our septic tank was.

They were able to find the septic tank, which is somehow partially under our AC unit and our deck (Look, we didn't build this house, okay?) which felt like waking up from a nightmare only to wake up and find out it's much worse than that.

But these guys were able to so skillfully, and delicately move around their obstacles with no damage to anything, and get our septic tank fixed. I am beyond impressed and so very thankful!

This company you can rely on. Called and they kindly added us to the daily schedule. Mike doesn't any $#!+ behind, (pun intended). This is the only company that we have called on over the 17 years we have been here! Grade A $#!+ crew.
Very professional and honest company. I would recommend them !

They came and did a job on my septic tank, I was very happy with their work, today when I needed service by a plumber, their referral did the job the same day and I would use him again.
Thanks again to the people at Royal Flush.

We moved in several years ago (2018 to be exact) and were told our system had been cleaned - like other things with this home, it had not been done properly. Royal Flush came early in the morning, cleaned it properly and thoroughly, and left - they made it it look easy (knowing full good and well that it is a thankless task). I am very pleased. Thank you, Royal Flush!

reviews.reviewText: Called Monday schedule for Wednesday arrived on time. Mr. Michael was super professional and informative. The price was the best in town. Definitely will use them again and refer my friends and family.
Great service and friendly folks! I would definitely recommend Royal Flush!
I called Royal Flush to clean out our septic and they did a wonderful job. They were very friendly and professional. I would recommend them to everyone.
On time friendly and very professional
Love them! They went above and beyond to get the job done! 100% satisfaction!

2nd time customer. They are on time type of people which is always appreciated. Serviced our system pretty quick and packed everything back down. The most reasonable prices out there with quality work.  10/10 Good folks

Great Service!! We had an 8:00 appt. We received a call stating they were on their way. They arrived on time and were very professional. The job was completed in a professional and timely manner. If/when we have our tank serviced again we will definitely be calling them.

First off, my wife and I had the total nightmare of our septic system suddenly failing and we were not able to take a shower, flush the toilet, do laundry, or dishes.  Furthermore, we had no idea where our septic tank was.

They were able to find the septic tank, which is somehow partially under our AC unit and our deck (Look, we didn't build this house, okay?) which felt like waking up from a nightmare only to wake up and find out it's much worse than that.

But these guys were able to so skillfully, and delicately move around their obstacles with no damage to anything, and get our septic tank fixed. I am beyond impressed and so very thankful!

This company you can rely on. Called and they kindly added us to the daily schedule. Mike doesn't any $#!+ behind, (pun intended). This is the only company that we have called on over the 17 years we have been here! Grade A $#!+ crew.
Very professional and honest company. I would recommend them !

They came and did a job on my septic tank, I was very happy with their work, today when I needed service by a plumber, their referral did the job the same day and I would use him again.
Thanks again to the people at Royal Flush.

We moved in several years ago (2018 to be exact) and were told our system had been cleaned - like other things with this home, it had not been done properly. Royal Flush came early in the morning, cleaned it properly and thoroughly, and left - they made it it look easy (knowing full good and well that it is a thankless task). I am very pleased. Thank you, Royal Flush!

reviews.reviewText: I have used this company twice and the service is very professional very friendly very responsive on time and very honest. I recommend them to anyone. Five stars all the way I will be using them again for my plumbing needs. Thank you very much for great service.
Scotts plumbing did an excellent job with replacing a septic tank in an older home. Good communication and fair pricing.

If I could give more than 5 stars to this company, I would. This company is truly professional and the quality of their work speaks for itself. I have had them repair my field lines for the septic tank, pump the septic tank, fix plumbing issues in my bathrooms, and god willing I won?t need anything else done ??, but if so, I know who to reach out to for awesome quality of work. Me and my family are truly grateful to have found this company because they are honest people.
Excellent service at a great price. Always there when you need them. Great people!
Great guys who do great work. Came in and explained to me exactly what was going on with my system, and what I needed to do to handle it. Got me all fixed up, highly recommended.
Scott?s Plumbing went above and beyond to help me through a tough time. Will definitely use them again.

I had the pleasure of meeting Joe and his dad a few months back. They came out because we needed a whole new system. Unfortunately at that time we found out we couldn?t put a new system where the old one was and had to have it pumped and lines pumped to hold us til today! They are some great people! We appreciate everything they did to help us make it last til now. We now have a completely new system. They were honest people and I would recommend them to anyone! THANK YOU AGAIN!

I had the pleasure of meeting with Joe during a scheduled Septic Tank inspection at my home. Joe was extremely knowledgeable, respectful, on time for the appointment and most of all honest. My reason for scheduling the appointment was to kinda get a second opinion for septic tank maintenance, I was very pleased with the time Joe spent and discussed with me during his visit and he was able to answer all my questions with a clear explanation that was easy to understand. I WILL be using this Septic Tank company for all my future septic pumping/repair needs. It was great meeting with you Joe and thanks for your time and information provided!
THANKS AGAIN!!!

Our septic tank decided to back up at the worst possible time. We call Scott and they came at their first opportunity. Though we had to wait for an appointment for their tractor, I was highly pleased with their work. Barry and his crew were fast and efficient in getting to the problem and getting us back online. Barry always gave me options and explained why our tank/ pipes needed this or that. He always told me what the prices upfront. I highly recommend Scott?s services. They are honest and work quickly.
Right on time and the work was done quick.

Wow! I cannot express how thankful I am for this one of a kind company and the exceptional, genuine, honest, perfectional work delivered by Yonko and Tyler!!!! Yonko and Tyler set an exceedingly high example for the rest of the world on how service should be done. Wow! Thank you Scott's Plumbing for these 2 gentlemen! Billion stars would be given if possible!
Great work. Thanks.

When working on your septic system or any plumbing issues it?s very import to trust a company that can deliver real time results. Scott?s plumbing, is a company I can stand by. I was working with Joe Sears closely as he did everything from pulling the permit, meeting the inspector during the mid job to pass inspection, and getting my septic system up to code. I had peace of mind knowing he was going to take care of everything! Thank you guys!
Very nice people doing very hard and very dirty work that you don't want to do....

They showed up on time and they were able to quickly change out the fixtures for us.  Their experience was evident and they knocked out the job that would have taking me all day (lol) in less than 30 minutes.  I also appreciate the fair price they charged me for the job.  I definitely will use them again for my plumbing needs and would not hesitate to recommend them for their service.

reviews.reviewText: Absolutely wonderful service!  I could not be happier with a company.
I love Southside. They aren't going to over promise or over price. They are honest and fair.

Glenn just completed four jobs for me and everything is better than ever. He is a master plumber, and his craftsmanship and instincts are better than anyone in the business. I give him the highest of recommendations!
Glenn is AMAZING. He goes above and beyond on everything and comes out for emergency night and weekend calls. We have used him several times and so grateful for him.

Glen came to our house and wrote up an initial free estimate two days early at the end of his business day for which we were grateful considering an associated time constraint. The job consisted of replacing the entire sewer line running around the house to the city tap at the road. This was a very extensive job given the length of run, proximity to two enormous oak trees (within 15 ft) and the age of the house/sewer (1948). He beat two other companies in price by alot which was initially alarming due to the complexity. He spent all day battling roots, antiquated sewage design and the sheer depth of the trench needed for such a long run. We had good flow the first day and didn't have to leave for showers that night. He capped off the cleanouts by 9 the next morning and was technically done. We also had a preexisting issue with a bathroom sink which was not in the scope of the job we agreed on, yet he came in, troubleshot the issue and determined that it couldn't be fixed immediately due to an unrelated issue.

Glen truly does fantastic, affordable work in a timely and transparent manner. He will get the job done right.
Did good work installing faucet.
They are so friendly, professional, and do great work every time!  Thank you!
The man that came to my house was very professional and knowledgeable about what needed to be done. Definitely gonna use them in the future

After returning home on july 6, from being out of town, we noticed that we had a leak. I became very discouraged when I began calling plumbing company's and they didn't answer, or told me they would call back and didn't. Finally i got someone to come out, but he decided he couldn't get into the tight end of the crawl space.  He refered us to Glen. We were told that Glen was good at getting into tight small places, and he was indead. Glen was very thorough and actually found that the leak was inside an access panel in the house the whole time. I highly recommend Glen at Southside Plumbing. He was even very comfortable with my dogs. Thank you Glen!
He fixed out problem quick and cheap.  Was only charged for a service call
had Glen come out to help with a well issue.  What a great guy!  Fixed us right up for a smaller amount then I ever dream of!  Thank you Glen!
Great company. Yep

I live in carrollton and had Glenn come by today to trouble shoot and fix a problem I just could not figure out... Let me tell you... Great guy, very social and willing to walk you through the problem and explain it and the fix. Mild mannered and easy going guy with great patience... He worked with me on a very fair bill. More fair for me than it was himself and I greatly appreciate it. Does great work and I recommend him for anyone with plumbing needs. Buisness located in carrollton and I gladly support our local businesses, especially those with respect, integrity, and quality work like southside plumbing... Thanks again Glenn!

reviews.reviewText: Needed some facuet's replaced Colin came out did a remarkable job So professional an fast they look Amazing Such A Great Company to do business with An very reasonable wouldn't have wanted better service!

Wow....David and Colin came in and took care of all our faucet and toliet repairs in a flash. Such nice people and really good with our 4 legged guys running around. They were on-time and actually running early and gave me a 30 minutes heads up to see if I was OK with it, which I was glad to hear. I have no problem recommending them or calling them again for plumbing or gas line issues. This is a fantastic small business and very worth your consideration.

I cannot speak highly enough of Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance. I called their office one afternoon and within a few hours, they arrived at our house to fix our water leak. They kept us informed throughout the process and explained where the leak was. Do not hesitate to contact Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance!

We have used David Strickland several times for different projects, the latest being the replacement of our hot water heater.  He comes when he says he will be there, he is quick to respond when you call, and he does a great job.  We won't use anyone else.

This is a fantastic company.  It's owned by an individual, which I like.  But what I like more is that they were on time, did an excellent job on installing a new toilet and a kitchen sink faucet, and it didn't cost the earth.  This is the only company I'll use when I need a plumber.

David Strickland installed a gas tankless hot water heater for us this week and, as always, did a fantastic job. David is the only plumber we use & he has helped us for many years. We highly recommend him.
We have had Strickland do two home projects for us now. They got it done quickly and professionally. Honest, friendly, locally owned company, and highly recommend.
David Strickland installed a new sink in our kitchen. He was quick, professional, and very reasonably priced.  Highly recommend him!
I highly recommend Strickland for all plumbing repairs.  Professional and all around great person!
Great service! I've used them twice now for separate issues. Each time they made it out earlier than the appointments and had me fixed within an hour.
If you want a job done right, and to be treated like a customer wants to be treated, then call Strickland Plumbing.  By far the most experienced and professional plumber around. Highly recommended !!

reviews.reviewText: I exclusively only use Tug and his team for my commercial businesses. They show up when they say they are and they are so responsive when I have an emergency. They are honest, hard working and solve the problems that are placed before them. I often have them in my businesses after hours and I never have had to worry about things going missing. They are truly great humans and great plumbers. You wont go wrong calling them!

Excellent work by plumbers who know what they?re doing. Had a collapsed sewage pipe and a pipe near a toilet with concrete inside the pipe (mistake by builder I?m assuming). They worked hard to get the concrete blockage removed along with years of some paper and lots of sludge. Like others have noted they cleaned up the whole mess and left me very happy. Thank you!  We highly recommend this company and will definitely contact when needed in the future. Thank you.

These were the only contractors that didn?t screw up the job at my salon. I had about four different contractors, and these people did an outstanding job and really went above and beyond for me? they have an outstanding work ethic and really care about their clients. I cannot recommend them enough

Had 2 other plumbers come out. They never fixed the slow drains. David came out and got the job done right at a super reasonable price. On time. Cleaned up after himself. Wish I would have called them first!
Great service, friendly staff, good prices. I will use them again!
Excellent service and workmanship

J. T. Was at my house the same day I needed him. He was able to isolate where the drain that feeds into the main drain was clogged. He had it all running in under an hour. He was very courteous and clean. I would recommend J. T. to anyone who may have a clogged drain. Very helpful!!!

Had work done on my tub and James did an amazing job. Kind courteous informative and fast. He was on time to the job (well the estimated time he gave). Followed directions and instructions that were given to get in the house and most of all friendly to my pup. I would highly recommend tug a rooter!
I have used this company a couple of times. Very polite and professional people. Also great prices and come out fairly quickly. I have never been disappointed with them.

I had very good experience.  My plumbing was backed up in the whole house.  I called Tug-A-Rooter after they were recommended to me.  Tug was at my house in just a few hours and got the problem fixed.  He is professional and courteous and I would highly recommend.
Great Service. Was able to come out quickly and fix my issue.
My shut off valve had rusted and broke off. Tug-a-rooter fixed it the next day in less than an hour. Great service!
One of the most down to earth, polite and honest contractors we have ever had the pleasure of getting work done by.  Cant recommend them enough!!!

reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough about Veterans plumbing. We were a victim of these crazy freezing temps and our laundry room pipe busted late Christmas afternoon. I called several plumbers and someone recommended Nick with Veterans. I called him and he answered on Christmas Day and said he could send someone out the next day. Every other plumber was Tuesday or Wednesday the earliest. They showed up early too and the value compared to what I have paid before was unbeatable. I had to ask Nick if the price was correct before I paid, as it was the best price I have seen in sometime. I am so glad I received this recommendation and they will definitely be my new plumbers of choice going forward!
We had our main water line leaking. Nick did an amazing job replacing the line and then helped us with extensive piping issue in our basement. Quality work, honest company. Highly recommend.
I received same day service.  They showed up on time.  Discussed issues with me before doing repair.  Cost was reasonable.  Very courteous.  Veterans is my plumber of choice.
